title: Great variety box!
content: This box is of Tampax Pearl Tampons is perfect, especially when your constantly on the go. I tend to use the “super” and “super plus” where as my teenage daughter tends to use the “regular” size and occasionally the “super” size. The smooth plastic applicator makes for easy comfortable use. These tampons provide great protection. Great for when you are very active (like sports or working out in the gym). We are constantly on the go with travel basketball, and it's not uncommon for me to have additional teenage girls with me. So having this box with us while traveling has been a life saver on so many occasions.
